title: Amazon Basics Easy Grip Workout Dumbbell, Neoprene Coated, Various Sets and Weights available
descriptions:
**Product Name:** Amazon Basics Easy Grip Workout Dumbbell, Neoprene Coated

Experience the convenience of working out at home with the Amazon Basics Easy Grip Workout Dumbbell! This dumbbell is a must-have for anyone looking to enhance their exercise and strength training routine. Here are some of its amazing features:

- **Weight:** Each dumbbell weighs 10 pounds, ensuring a challenging workout for beginners and experienced users alike.
- **Set Included:** You'll receive a set of 2 dumbbells, providing you with a complete workout solution.
- **Neoprene Coating:** The durable neoprene coating not only adds a stylish touch with its Navy Blue color but also ensures long-lasting use.
- **Hexagon Shape:** The hexagonal shape prevents rolling, keeping your workout area safe and clutter-free.
- **Nonslip Grip:** The nonslip grip ensures a secure hold, providing comfort and safety during your workout sessions.
- **Weight Identification:** Each dumbbell features a printed number on the end cap, making it easy to identify the weight.
- **Color Coding:** The dumbbells are color-coded for quick weight identification, streamlining your workout process.
- **Multiple Sizes Available:** If you prefer different weights, this dumbbell is available in multiple sizes to suit your specific needs.

Upgrade your home gym with the Amazon Basics Easy Grip Workout Dumbbell and take your fitness journey to the next level!
